name: Independent Research in Sociology
description: Intended for Sociology Specialists and Majors who wish to explore a specific Sociology topic in depth. To enrol, a student must prepare a proposal form in consultation with a faculty supervisor and submit the signed form to the academic counsellor. Students may take a maximum of 2.0 credits of independent studies.
prerequisites: SOC205H5/SOC231H5, SOC221H5, SOC222H5, 0.5 SOC credit at the 300 level, 4th Year Standing, P.I.
